column2: Unlocks extra decisions to customize start with ruler-designed characters.
Revoke every landed title in the realm for redistribution.
Since you can't convert mercenary captains, you can chose instead to give it to a character of your religion and/or culture.
Open an event for quickly converting all provinces, vassals, and/or courtiers.
Recruit a nobleman skilled in diplomacy for service to the realm.
Recruit a soldier skilled in martial arts for service to the realm.
Recruit a steward skilled in money management for service to the realm.
Recruit a shady character skilled in espionage for service to the realm.
Recruit a learned holy man for service to the realm.
Invite a woman of your religion and culture to your court.
Permanently remove the custom start decisions
Get rid of baggage from the previous ruler.
Construct a fleet of 10 ships out of thin air. Useful for starting as a viking in a low-shipbuilding-tech realm.
Recruit able-bodied infantry men out of thin air to help defend your realm.
Recruit able-bodied cavalrymen or archers out of thin air to help defend your realm.
Recruit fearsome special troops like horse archers, war elephants, and (*sigh*) camel cavalry.
Add or subtract money from your starting treasury.
Add or subtract from your starting prestige.
Add or subtract from your starting piety.
As you survey your new-found realm, you find that there are certain aspects you simply do not like.
Time for some sweeping changes around here!
This is a message announcing the commencement of the realm purge. Effective immediately, all titles not held by the crown save nomadic titles and unlanded titular titles are hereby revoked.
Your liege thanks you for your cooperation!
Choose what you want to convert.
Life would be easier if all of my counties were...
Life would be easier if all of my vassals were...
Life would be easier if all of my courtiers were...
Replace all mercenary captains with characters of...
Are you sure you want to remove all additional options?
Are you sure you want to declare independence?
Which type of troops do you want to recruit?
Which type of troops do you want to recruit?
Which type of troops do you want to recruit?

This is a message announcing the commencement of the realm purge. Effective immediately, all titles not held by the crown save nomadic titles, unlanded titular titles, and baronies are hereby revoked.
Your liege thanks you for your cooperation!
